page.title: 15BAYSGARTH SCHOOL
page.content: In 1975 comprehensive{education}was introduced in Barton.This was achieved by joining together Beretun Secondary school on Barrow Road with the Barton Grammar School on Caistor Road. The new school caters for the children of Barton and the surrounding villages from the ages of 11 to 18. The school is housed in two sets of buildings separated by a playing field but linked by a tarmac path. The school is organised into 6 houses and has extensive facilities including a sports hall and drama studio. The size of the school in 1985 was 1350 pupils and approx.88 staff although the fall in school population has led to the loss of Bardney house in 1985 the first headmaster,R.N Smithson,retired at the end of 1985.
